website_summaries.verdict: Choose this round brush if you prefer stiffer bristles, as they are structured to provide control during styling and to help hair dry faster. However, not all users are fans.
pros: Features a unique bristle system that's designed to work in wet hair by significantly reducing the time it takes for tresses to dry
Recipient of Allure magazine's Best of Beauty award
cons: Stiff bristles have a tendency to tangle in very curly or fine hair
Challenging to maneuver at first, especially if you are used to boar bristles or other soft bristles

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best blow dryer brush I have ever used. No rubber on the handle to pull your hair. Good sturdy bristles that do not melt or bend in the heat. It is well worth the money paid for it. Leaves lots of body in the hair as well. I haven't had to use the flat iron since I bought this. I have shoulder length hair. Very curly, fine and thick I can style with this brush and it doesn't pull hair out or break it off. Highly recommend this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Hair Destroyer - Not for Wavy Hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have perfect hair which isn't prone to tangling or shorter hair, this might be fine. One "loop" in my waist-length hair and it tangled so badly, I had to wrestle with it for over two hours before cutting it out. The detangler is great, but this brush was a nightmare for me. I don't recommend for long, thick, or tangle-prone hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dean Mack

customer_reviews.title: Breaks your hair off because the bristles are made of a tacky rubber
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is I should have read the reviews instead of buying review. It is made of a tacky rubber. Which does not detangle your hair. It snaps it in two instead because the hair can not glide though as the rubber is tacky. It does not make a nice curl, my hair is frizzy now, my hairline is fuzzy instead of lifted. I can’t begin on this tool. They got this one so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: A round brush that actually makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I never thought a hairbrush would make a difference, but this round brush is so amazing! Gives my long, medium-fine hair volume and curl, AND 2nd day hair still looks styled the next day. I'm not a huge fan of using styling products, and with this brush, I don't feel like I need to. I just blow dry with my inexpensive $20 hair dryer and have fantastic results. Not sure why some reviews says the brush hurts or isn't easy to clean, as that has not been my experience. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made Roller Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate in roller brushes and is very well-made. For those with smaller hands, it may be best to purchase the next size down as the large version could feel over-sized. Additionally, the brush may not store well depending on vanity size and storage options available to you. Nevertheless, the best roller brush I have used in quite some time!
customer_reviews.author: cedoubleu

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dry brush EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've used hundreds of brushes and this brush is hands down the best brush for blow drying that I've ever used! It does not rip or pull hair at all and the large is the perfect size for mid-back length hair! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my mid-length hair!
customer_reviews.text: shorten dry time and detangle like a charm! Love it! My hair is about a bit longer than shoulder length and the Large size works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great for long hair, it’s a wide hairbrush. I loved it because it doesn't pull my hair or breaks it - I have highlighted hair. After months using is super easy to clean, I don't see those little ”fuzz” that makes your hairbrush dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Belarmino

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this round brush. I was hesitant to buy this because I love the result of using boar bristle round brushes to blow dry. This brush smoothes and polishes hair the same way any of my boar bristle brushes do. Feels good in the hand, and it's easy to get nice tension for blow drying. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Too hard.  Hurts my head!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is so hard. It hurts my head. I can't imagine anybody liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Flores

customer_reviews.title: Worst Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the tangle teezer brand, this brush is unusable. The bristles are so hard and stiff it is painful to use and gets caught in my hair. This was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! I bought this after my hair lady used it on me at my appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleena Sammy

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: it gives the full volumne. I bought this for myself and for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Seungil

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as the original tangle teaser, but does help reduce frizz
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t make it as smooth as a metal brush, but does a good job drying (hopefully with less heat damage!)
customer_reviews.author: ashley t.

customer_reviews.title: Greatbto smooth out dry hair
customer_reviews.text: Smooths out my dry hair but not crazy about the slippery handle.
customer_reviews.author: Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Eeh!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't comb through hair as easy as I thought when blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: Rasha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: gets tangled in my hair, so maybe doing something wrong
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Only took me 30mins to blow out my hair when it’s usually an all day process
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Round Brush
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fine brush for medium to long hair. I really need a medium size. The large one doesn’t give my fine hair much body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for an easy blow out
customer_reviews.text: Great job creating a rounded curl at the bottom. It's difficult to grasp at first go but then you get the hang of it. Overall a great brush to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t melt, doesn’t cause breakage!
customer_reviews.text: Great for detangling and drying. For styling need boar/nylon brush afterwards. Doesn’t melt!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush ever for curly Q's
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that this brush is the by far the best brush ever for my naturally curly hair, it grabs your hair perfect and makes it very straight, and gives your hair lift or waves (i don't even have to use a flat iron anymore)........also, if anyone remember those plastic GOODY brushes that were like $2.99 with the black handle and pink brush head from the 70's, this brush is just like them. I have looked high and low for that goody brush, could not find it anywhere! Although it's much more expensive but worth every penny. I'm glad I found it! So if you have curly unruly hair try this brush, you WILL NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Gets tangled! Causes static!
customer_reviews.text: Somehow seems to get easily tangled in my fine wavy not-very-long hair. It also made it very, VERY staticky. I looked like I’d had my finger in a light socket! Loved that it had very sturdy, firm “bristles” that penetrated and grabbed my fairly thick hair, but I just could not use it at all because of the tangling... had to give it to my daughter, who seems to like it for her very long, very thick, mostly straight and smooth hair.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Luv

customer_reviews.title: Pain free blow-styling hair brush
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush is awesome while blow drying my hair and to get that nice wave on the bottom. The only downside is....how do you clean it? I take the time to use tweezers to dig out the hair. This brush does not hurt to use. I love tangle teezers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is the perfect brush to use on a daily basis or when you are hair drying your hair - it is strong and It does what it is supposed to. I do recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: MRS D

customer_reviews.title: Round Brush that doesn't tangle
customer_reviews.text: This is a good round brush for me. My hair is fine and tangles easily. My other bristle brush was pulling out too much hair. This one doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Mcelvey

customer_reviews.title: Bristles VERY hard plastic; hurts head
customer_reviews.text: These bristles are extremely hard plastic with no give to them whatsoever. It pulls my hair and hurts my scalp so unfortunately, I won't be using it. My friend has one that has flexibility in the bristles and doesn't hurt my scalp so I'm wondering if I received a knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: DBDZR

customer_reviews.title: Better handgrip needed
customer_reviews.text: Not small enough for short hair and handgrip is not user friendly...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Girl UK = Lucky me!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Only 9 days for an international product is absolutely fabulous! Used it immediately. Perfect product in brand new condition and fast shipping! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is actually amazing. I did not think your brush would really ...
customer_reviews.text: This is actually amazing. I did not think your brush would really matter that much, but I am really happy with this brush. I would recommend it, and may buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, but not a Small Brush
customer_reviews.text: Works well for styling wet hair, but does get tangled sometimes. Larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: lindawisch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that the bristles are well separated and long.
customer_reviews.author: DEEDEE

product_meta.title: Tangle Teezer Blow Drying Round Tool, Large
feature_bullets: Quick drying results; no pre dry needed as the teeth do the work
Distinctive teeth configuration delivers free-flow tension to allow the hair to dry with volume, natural movement and shine
Styles hair from Wet to dry for a smooth finish with no pulling or tugging
No need to place the hairdryer nozzle onto the teeth
Our healthiest blow-dry yet, for short to medium hair
